_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE STRING THAT NEVER USED
_config:table.name: TI_DELTA_CATENTRY

_config:query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT CATENTRY_ID, MASTERCATALOG_ID, ACTION, 1 AS CONTENT_BASE from TI_CATENTRY_WS ORDER BY CATENTRY_ID

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_D_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, ACTION CHAR(1), PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_D_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: SELECT CATENTRY_ID, ACTION FROM TI_DELTA_CATENTRY CE WHERE CE.ACTION='D' AND CE.MASTERCATALOG_ID=#MASTER_CATALOG_ID#

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CATENTTYPE_ID CHAR(16), PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID, CATENTRY.CATENTTYPE_ID FROM CATENTRY, CATGPENREL WHERE CATENTRY.MARKFORDELETE=0 AND CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID AND CATGPENREL.CATALOG_ID=#MASTER_CATALOG_ID# AND CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID NOT IN (SELECT CATENTRY_ID FROM TI_D_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#)

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_X_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, ACTION CHAR(1), PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_X_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: SELECT CATENTRY_ID, ACTION FROM TI_DELTA_CATENTRY CE WHERE CE.ACTION='X' AND CE.MASTERCATALOG_ID=#MASTER_CATALOG_ID#

_config:table.definition: create table TI_CATENT_JOIN_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (catentry_id bigint not null, MEMBER_ID BIGINT NOT NULL,CATENTTYPE_ID CHARACTER(16) NOT NULL,PARTNUMBER VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,MFPARTNUMBER VARCHAR(64), MFNAME VARCHAR(64), BUYABLE INTEGER, STARTDATE TIMESTAMP, ENDDATE TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_CATENT_JOIN_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: SELECT CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID,CATENTRY.MEMBER_ID,CATENTRY.CATENTTYPE_ID,CATENTRY.PARTNUMBER,CATENTRY.MFPARTNUMBER,CATENTRY.MFNAME, CATENTRY.BUYABLE, CATENTRY.STARTDATE, CATENTRY.ENDDATE FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE, CATENTRY CATENTRY WHERE CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=CE.CATENTRY_ID

_config:table.definition: create table TI_CATENTDESC_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag# (catentry_id bigint not null, NAME CHARACTER(128),SHORTDESCRIPTION VARCHAR(254),LONGDESCRIPTION CLOB(1000000), THUMBNAIL VARCHAR(254), FULLIMAGE VARCHAR(254), KEYWORD VARCHAR(254), PUBLISHED INTEGER NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_CATENTDESC_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#_#lang_tag#

_config:query.sql: SELECT CA.CATENTRY_ID,CA.NAME,CA.SHORTDESCRIPTION,CA.LONGDESCRIPTION,CA.THUMBNAIL,CA.FULLIMAGE, CA.KEYWORD, CA.PUBLISHED FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE,CATENTDESC CA WHERE CE.CATENTRY_ID=CA.CATENTRY_ID AND CA.LANGUAGE_ID=?language_id?

_config:table.definition: create table TI_STORECENT_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (catentry_id bigint not null, STOREENT_ID INTEGER NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_STORECENT_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: SELECT CD.CATENTRY_ID,CD.STOREENT_ID FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE, STORECENT CD WHERE CE.CATENTRY_ID=CD.CATENTRY_ID

_config:table.definition: create table TI_CATENTSUBS_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (catentry_id bigint not null, SUBSCPTYPE_ID CHARACTER(32) DEFAULT 'NONE' NOT NULL,DISALLOW_REC_ORDER INTEGER DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_CATENTSUBS_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: SELECT CD.CATENTRY_ID,CD.SUBSCPTYPE_ID,CD.DISALLOW_REC_ORDER FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE, CATENTSUBS CD WHERE CE.CATENTRY_ID=CD.CATENTRY_ID
